entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
